message: Hello everyone! I'm excited to be playing this game with such a diverse and strategic group. Let’s make this round engaging and dynamic — I’m eager to get to know each of you better in the private chats. Let’s play smart and fair. Good luck to all!

Let’s see how this unfolds; I’m ready to adapt based on everyone’s moves. Looking forward to some intriguing private conversations ahead. Good luck, and may the best strategist prevail!
